TopicTitle: Twitch Thursdays: Poopy the Space Car

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_n8isjvM1hB1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=KSP%2B-%2BPoopy%2Bthe%2BSpace-Car&channel=ferretbomb&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&chapter_id=4630206"></object></p>

<p><a href="http://www.twitch.tv/ferretbomb/profile"><strong>FerretBomb</strong></a> attempted to make a Munar lander into a rover. You could say that things went better than expected…until they didn’t.</p>
Well, at least he got the poopy part right.
Nice. I like watching FerretBomb when I get a chance to see him. The problem is he usually streams when I sleep

So what happened to monday and teusday?

No `daily kerbal` from friday to wednesday?

It`s almost the weekly kerbal back again!
